DescribeLogSearch.document:
LogQuerys 表示日志检索条件，
其中: LogQuerys.0.Name=api_id&LogQuerys.0.Operator==&LogQuerys.0.Value=api-55rj9ide
表示检索api_id=api-55rj9ide的日志
DescribeLogSearch.title: Filters参数示例

DescribeLogSearch.document: 下面的示例提示参数错误

ImportOpenApi.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apigateway.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImportOpenApi
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ServiceId": "service-xxxxx",
    "EncodeType": "YAML",
    "Content": "info:
  title:test
  version: 1.0.1
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /:
    get:
      operationId: test
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The list of possible responsesas they are returned from executing
            this operation.
      x-apigw-api-business-type: NORMAL
      x-apigw-api-type: NORMAL
      x-apigw-backend:
        MockReturnHttpHeaders: []
        MockReturnHttpStatusCode: 200
        ServiceMockReturnMessage: ok
        ServiceType: MOCK
      x-apigw-cors: false
      x-apigw-protocol: HTTP
      x-apigw-service-timeout: 15
",
    "ContentVersion": "openAPI"
}
ImportOpenApi.title: ImportOpenApi

ModifyApi.document: 可调用此接口对已经配置的 API 接口进行编辑修改。修改后的 API 需要重新发布 API 所在的服务到对应环境方能生效
ModifyApi.title: ModifyApi

UpdateService.document: 本接口（UpdateService）用于从服务发布的环境中运行版本切换到特定版本。用户在使用 API 网关创建服务并发布服务到某个环境后，多因开发过程会产生多个版本，此时可调用本接口。
UpdateService.title: UpdateService
